blocks.content:
## Beware, this is a pirate island!

Feel free to hang around the island as you please. For aspiring pirates, the job description is _[here](/about "About the pirate")_. If you are interested in learning about the adventures of an old DevOps pirate, then head right over to the _[Captain's log](/blog "captains log")_.  go  grab yourself a coconut or two from the trees on the island, but don't go looking for **treasure** now, my trusty parrot _Seamus_ will be quick to peck your eyeballs out, you greedy thieving scabby sea bass!!! Aaarrrrr
